Mohamed Akkari (Arabic: محمد العكاري, a mụrụ n'afọ 1978 na Tunis - nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2017 na Mahdia) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na  Redio

Mohamed Akkari nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi mgbe a wasịrị ya. E liri ya na Mahdia Marine Cemetery n'ihu ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-akwado ya. Rabaa Essefi kwuru na usoro ikpeazụ nke Dawama soap opera nke e mere na Mohamed mere na Sfax otu izu tupu ọnwụ ya.
